Category:Minigames

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Minigames are small games within PT that accomplish tasks or provide entertainment during periods that would otherwise be spent simply waiting.

Contents

  • 1 Minigame Associations
  • 2 Minigame Concepts
  • 3 Suggested Minigames
  • 4 Not Appropriate for Minigames

Minigame Associations

One of the key things in using minigames is to associate the minigame action with the activity the character is involved in. Thus, the Tumbler minigame, with it's connotations of manipulating lock positions with tools, is a better "fit" than a game that involves connecting separate puzzle-type pieces together.

Minigame Concepts

Minigames come in a variety of forms, each of which has many permutations. Some concepts, and associated permutations, include;

  • spacial puzzles; tetris.
  • Crosswords; sodoku
  • Anagrams; Tumbler

Suggested Minigames

  • Spellcasting may be particularly suited to a minigame.
  • Some PT-unique form of gambling has been suggested.
  • Some aspects of Farmer, Trainer, Crafting, or other Job Skills may be appropriate for an integrated minigame to provide interaction during wait times.

Not Appropriate for Minigames

  • Combat will have non-minigame interactive components for those who want things to do other than "click and wait" combat.
  • The design aspect of Crafting will be an involved activity, requiring manipulation of game variables and (for those interested) the submission of work produced with real-life skills.
